name: 5 Star Hawaii Resort - Your Resort
description: It's Aloha Time! Build a Super Luxury Hotel on Hawaii. Keep that "Hang Loose" feeling even when the going gets tough in the service department.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Pentium (or similar AMD) 1.5 GHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 200 MB available space
